--double_crochet treble_crochet -triple crochet 2dctog two double_crochet together -yarn over insert the hook into the next stitch yarn over draw the yarn through the stitch yarn over draw the yarn through 2 loops on the hook yarn over insert hook in same space yarn over draw the yarn through the 2 loops yarn over draw the yarn through the 3 remaining loops on the hook row 1 ch10 half_double_crochet in 4th chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 6 st ch3 turn row2 dcinsamest ch1 sknextst dcinnextst ch1 sknextst dcinnextst ch1 sknextst 2dctoginnextst ch3 turn row 3 dcinsamest ch1 sknextchsp dcinnextst ch1 sknextchsp dcin nextst ch1 sknextchsp sknextst 2dctoginnextst ch3 turn row 4 2 half_double_crochet in 3nd chain from hook single_crochet across next 7 st / chain space double_crochet treble_crochet in next st this will be the chain we used to turn ch1 turn row 5 single_crochet in same space single_crochet across next 4 st ch4 skip st single_crochet across next 5 st ch2 turn row 6 half_double_crochet in same space ch5 skip next 4 st single_crochet in chain space ch5 skip next 4 st 2hdc in next st ch1 turn row 7 single_crochet in same space 5sc in each of next 2 chain space single_crochet in next st ch1 turn row 8 skip next st single_crochet in next st single_crochet across next 9 sts ch1 turn row 9 skip next st single_crochet in next st single_crochet across next 7 sts ch1 turn 2 row 10 skip next st single_crochet in next single_crochet across next 4 st ch6 working to your left see photo a double_crochet in top of st from row 7 ch5 double_crochet in top of st of row 4 ch5 treble_crochet in top of st from row 1 ch4 half_double_crochet in first chain space of row 1 this will be the beg chain from row 1 ch5 skip next 5 chain space / st from row 1 half_double_crochet in next chain space / st ch4 treble_crochet in top of st from row 1 chain 5 double_crochet in top of st from row 4 chain 5 double_crochet in top of st from row 7 ch4 half_double_crochet in top of st from row 10 ch5 join with slip_stitch to 2nd chain from beg see photo b photo a >> photo b>> row 11 ch1 *5sc in next chain space single_crochet ch3 5sc next chain space 5sc ch3 single_crochet in next chain space 5sc in next chain space 4sc ch3 4sc in next chain space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch into first single_crochet border slip_stitch into next st ch1 single_crochet in same space *ch1 skip next 4sts working now in that little chain space > treble_crochet ch3 single_crochet on top of last
